musthead.title: The fair blockchain bank
musthead.desc: Take part in the open testing of cryptocurrency transfers by phone number and earn additional ZAM tokens

features.title: Why does the world need blockchain banks?
features.desc: Zamzam mission is to speed up the process of the transition from a traditional monetary system to a fully digital economy in order for banks and financial institutions all over the world to become open, fair and efficient through the implementation of blockchain and decentralized systems.

openness.title: Openness
openness.desc: Transparency of all operations in blockchain. Real-time publication of the Zamzam bank’s detailed financial activities. Open results of bank audit. You have never worked with such an open banking system!

fairness.title: Fairness
fairness.desc: Provide users with a choice between centralized and decentralized assets storage. Future is for hybrid systems, which give freedom of choice.

efficiency.title: Efficiency
efficiency.desc: Reduce costs by circumventing the chain of intermediaries and abandoning obsolete methods of managing financial organizations.

wallet.name: zam wallet
wallet.title: Cryptocurrency wallet, as it should be
wallet.desc: Stop wasting your attention on dozens of financial applications with severely limited functionalities. The zam.wallet erases the boundaries between traditional money and cryptocurrencies while remaining more efficient than the market by 2-3 times.

merchant.name: Zam Merchant
merchant.title: Effortless financial management for your business!
merchant.desc: Doing business has never been so easy, intuitive & automated. While developing the zam.merchant, we took into account the needs of thousands of businessmеn from all over the world.

chain.name: Zam Chain
chain.title: Fast financial blockchain based on Stellar fork
chain.desc: We are creating an independent blockchain bank with the lowest commissions for the end user. This technology is formed on the basis of our financial system to make the Zamzam products decentralized.

table.title: Pricing
data: Transfers of cryptocurrency by phone number
Purchase of cryptocurrency with Visa, MasterCard, UnionPay cards
Instant exchange of cryptocurrency for fiat money and withdrawal them to a bank card
Ability to bind 1 bank card for withdrawal
Free SMS notifications of transactions per month
Limit per month for withdrawal to the card

alpha.title: Test zam wallet and get 1000 ZAM as a gift for premium payment

iliaBeniaminov.name: Iliya Biniaminov
list: Successful business developer with assets capitalisation of $50 mln.
Lobbyist in Turkey, Dubai, Israel, Russia and CIS
Speaks 6 languages (Turkish, English, Hebrew, Farsi, Russian, Azerbaijani)
Long track record of work in the financial market in Europe and CIS

alexMikh.name: Alex Mikh
list: Solid experience in business development
6 years of experience of managing investment company with Swissquote Bank white label
6 years of experience of asset management on American Stock Exchange (AMEX)
Lead the representative office of one of the fastest-growing international payment providers in the world
Was responsible for business negotiations aimed at obtaining a payment system license in Cyprus
Responsible for developing a currencies exchange system service

list: Crypto investor, blockchain evangelist
10 years of experience in marketing and product design
Owner of MakeFresh, international marketing agency
Experience in promotion of international corporations with HQs in Europe, Turkey, Dubai

zakariaMekreloufi.name: Zakaria Mekreloufi
list: Founder of MKG Real Estate & Investment, a leading brokerage company for asset management in the Middle East and North Africa with a head office in Dubai, UAE
Has a CFA level 1 certificate and works closely with the government of Dubai, attracting investments in the stock and financial markets, as well as small and medium-sized businesses

andrewSkurlatov.name: Andrew Skurlatov
list: 10 years of experience of high-load systems development
5 years of experience as an expert in blockchain technologies
Developed wallets for 15 cryptocurrencies
Designed and managed the development of DEX exchange based on a proprietary blockchain system of smart contracts
Designed and managed the development of cryptocurrency indexes

ivanPodtsebnev.name: Ivan Podtsebnev
list: Experience in hardware and software system implementation in projects with Microsoft , IBM, HP, Intel, Cisco, McAfee, Kaspersky
Expert in the topics of intranet protocol, virtualization and storage systems, architecture of algo trading robots
2 years of experience in Federal Agency of Government Communications and Information (FAGCI)

nikitaVelko.name: Nikita Velko
list: 9 years of experience in front-end development
Participated in projects with Google, LG, Adidas, McDonald’s, KFC
Experience in development at several startups with high ratings on Product Hunt
Developed a system of cryptocurrencies graphics for DEX exchange indexes

alexPonomaryov.name: Alex Ponomaryov
list: Has been developing applications in the Swift language since 2016
Knows Java, C#, C ++, as well as basic algorithms, data structures, design patterns, SQL, Git Flow
Made a game for Android, which had over 150,000 downloads

danielDanilkin.name: Daniel Danilkin
list: 7 years of experience in software development
Experience in system engineering based on Big Data
Was part of the team which developed a lending system in the banking sector
Participant as a developer in several open source projects

dzhavidKhalilov.name: Dzhavid Khalilov
list: Winner of SpaceAppChallenge hackathon organized by NASA (2017) and Yandex. Money Codefest (2018)
Participant of HackUPC and Junction hackathons (2017)

dzeraGazdanova.name: Dzera Gazdanova
list: Press Secretary
Graduated from the Faculty of International Journalism of St. Petersburg State University
Worked in the press-service of St. Petersburg State University
Was a chief  editor of the project in the Rosbalt news agency
Knows Ossetian,  English, Russian and Greek languages

alinaBelova.name: Alina Belova
list: Specialist in Public Relations
Graduated from the Institute of Art for Modeling and Design named after Salvador Dali
Was an assistant of financial director of 4Cervice group Company
Was a chief of a model agency
Owns a business in organizing contests, events, private summits

paulAverkiev.name: Paul Averkiev
list: During the last ten years has attracted more than $450 000 000
MBA diploma, graduated from  Henley Business School
More than ten years of experience in investment banking
Seven years as a director of «VTB Capital»
Vice president of the institutional sales department at «Otkritie Capital»
Head of the investment department at London Hedge fund «Prosperity Capital Management»

kamranKhan.name: Kamran Khan
list: Mr. Khan is the CEO and Managing Partner of Singapore-based Emerging Infra-Tech Partners (EIP) and Infra-Tech Capital (ITC).
Has led over $12 billion of infrastructure investments in emerging markets.

He brings over 25 years of project finance investment banking expertise with firms including J.P. Morgan, Goldman Sachs, US Agency for International Development (USAID), the World Bank (WB) and the US Millennium Challenge Corporation (MCC).
Was appointed by President Obama to serve as Vice President at MCC (rank of Assistant Secretary in the US Government)
financial advisory experience includes participation in closing M&A transactions totaling approximately $10 billion.

Is a member of the Global Board of International Project Finance Association (IPFA) and has served as Technical Advisor to Asia Pacific Economic Cooperation (APEC), Association of Southeast Asian Nations (ASEAN) and Group of Twenty (G20).

namigMamedov.name: Namig Mamedov
list: He was the director of the Sales and Marketing department at Caspian American Telecom
From 2002 to 2005, he was a senior manager at Caspian Electronics
In 2005, he was appointed to the post of CEO of LLC Caspel
Since 2008 to this day, Masum is chairman of the Board of the Caspel international holding company

andrewKoch.name: Andrew Koch
list: Не is an advisor of Singapore’s government, a businessman and a public figure

Has more than 28 years of expertise covering all aspects of banking and enterprise risk management including credit risk, market risk, operational risk, technology risk, as well as fraud risk and cyber risk
Currently, Andrew is the Director at the Investment Management Association of Singapore (“IMAS”)
Involved in more than 200 technology projects, connected with risk management and financial technologies

timurMarshani.name: Timur Marshani
list: 15 years of experience as one of the most recognized Russian lawyers
One of the best lawyers in terms of percentage of won cases
Long track record of international legal cases
Regular commentator on legal issues on key TV news channels in the CIS

samyNaceri.name: Samy Naceri
list: Samy is a famous French actor and well-known public figure.
Was in more than in 35 movies, including The Code and four Taxi films directed by Luc Besson.
Got several awards and was nominated at international film festivals.
Has strong connections with  Algerian population of France (about 13% of total) and knows the problems they face trying to support their families overseas.
As an influencer, also promotes ZamZam solution among Muslims worldwide.
